name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I specialize in full-stack development and possess strong proficiency in **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, **Node.js**, and **Python**. I am well-versed in modern front-end frameworks such as **React** and **Angular**, and have a comprehensive understanding of database technologies including **MySQL** and **PostgreSQL**. My experience extends to using **Git** for version control and developing robust APIs that drive seamless application performance.

I have demonstrated expertise in cloud services, particularly with **AWS** and **Azure**, enabling me to design and implement scalable serverless architectures. Additionally, I have integrated CRM solutions, including **HubSpot**, **Salesforce**, and **Dynamics** into enterprise-grade applications.

My background in building high-performance solutions across healthcare and financial sectors is complemented by my strong foundation in microservices architecture, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation. I have successfully led the development of platforms incorporating AI/ML capabilities, predictive analytics, and real-time data processing, ensuring compliance with standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS. My hands-on experience with machine learning pipelines using tools like **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** further enhances my ability to deliver secure and efficient applications.

experience.responsibilities:

• Architected and maintained database systems using **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, ensuring optimal performance and data integrity for applications handling large-scale transactions.
• Created robust APIs that enable integration with various third-party services, ensuring secure communication and data exchange across platforms.

• Drove the implementation of comprehensive testing strategies using **Jest** and **Cypress**, achieving at least **90%** test coverage for critical application components.
• Spearheaded the integration of advanced analytics and reporting features into applications utilizing **Power BI** and **Firebase**, enabling real-time data insights and decision-making.
• Fostered collaboration with cross-functional teams, including DevOps and product management, facilitating the successful delivery of multiple **versions** of high-impact software solutions on schedule.
• Engaged in continuous learning and application of best practices in software engineering, ensuring familiarity with emerging technologies and updating tech stack prowess accordingly.

Implemented robust event-driven architectures by integrating **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, supporting more than **1,000** real-time events processed per second.
Developed ETL pipelines utilizing **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** for efficient data ingestion, managing both batch and real-time data from internal and third-party sources, and ensuring data accuracy within **98%**.
Applied **AI/ML** techniques for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure Machine Learning**, achieving a model accuracy of **92%** for detecting suspicious banking transactions.

Developed and optimized web applications and services using **HTML**, **CSS**, **JavaScript**, **Python** (**FastAPI**, **Django**), and **Node.js** (**NestJS**, **Express**), ensuring robust, scalable, and maintainable code across platforms.
Engineered backend services that enhance performance and reliability for high-traffic e-commerce platforms, with a focus on modular architecture and **API** design.
Created responsive, SEO-friendly user interfaces utilizing **React** (version **18**), **Angular**, and enhanced with **TypeScript** and **Tailwind CSS**, achieving fast, engaging web experiences that support mobile accessibility.
Implemented secure and efficient data management solutions using **PostgreSQL** and **MySQL**, ensuring fault tolerance and quick data retrieval across multiple services, thereby optimizing response times during peak operations.
Utilized version control and collaboration tools like **Git** to manage codebase effectively, supporting team projects and continuous integration/continuous deployment (CI/CD) practices.
Architected real-time data processing features utilizing event-driven platforms like **Kafka** and **RabbitMQ** to enable instantaneous updates and notifications across the e-commerce infrastructure.
Facilitated cloud-based deployment and scaling strategies using **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring high availability and resilience of applications across multiple environments.
Created secure payment integration workflows with **Stripe**, **PayPal**, and **Razorpay**, emphasizing compliance with PCI standards to protect transaction data.
Managed user authentication and session integrity through **OAuth 2.0** and implemented role-based access control (RBAC) for secure interactions within the application.
